Package Lists

Interface ListADT<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements held in this collection
All Superinterfaces:
Iterable<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ArrayOrderedListADT<T>, ArrayUnorderedListADT<T>, DoubleOrderedListADT<T>, DoubleUnorderedListADT<T>, OrderedListADT<T>, UnorderedListADT<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArrayList, ArrayOrderedList, ArrayUnorderedList, DoubleLinkedList, DoubleOrderedList, DoubleUnorderedList, LinkedList, OrderedList, Recursion, UnorderedList
public interface ListADT<T> extends Iterable<T>
ListADT defines the interface to a general list collection. Specific types of lists will extend this interface to complete the set of necessary operations.
